attributes.action: consider military intervention in Zimbabwe to remove Mugabe and oversee and enforce fair and free elections.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK has a moral obligation to ensure that the democratic process in Zimbabwe is honored.  We urge the PM to consider military intervention to remove the Zanu (PF) and Mugabe and oversee a fair and free election process.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
